response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This product holds significant worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality and utility. Considering its value, I am offering it to you at a special price of $900,000. This is a generous offer that aims to benefit both parties by providing you with an excellent investment or asset, while allowing me to recoup a substantial portion of the product's worth. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise between the intrinsic value of the product and my need to recover its cost. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 900000}
